name: Save Witch
description:
Smart witch loses her body in an unintended explosion. Fortunately,  she has loyal servants who can be possessed by her spirit. Help her control these body and transport her spirit to crystal orb.

This game is made for Ludum Dare 41 in the theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres". And it is a Platformer + Maze Puzzle game.  Time is limited, so I only did 2 levels and deleted a usable character.
